title: The New York Times is staffing up in video
description: The New York Times has hired eight new journalists for its video department, the news organization announced today. Another 14 video-related roles remain open. The new hires include Robert Libetti (2025 Nieman fellow), the former head of documentaries at Brut America, two video producers previously at Vice News, and a short-form video journalist from The Boston...
